Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Accessibility trumps all aspects... From my experience, if I ask a question from tutor on forums, I might get a response in may be few days time. With GenAI you can get instant answer. GenAI is not always correct, so you will have to do your own reasoning sometimes to better understand certain things which I found to be a great way to make mistakes, question back and understand subject better than cramming.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I mostly ask questions from tutor when there are discrepancies between lectures, what's expected for assesments and so on. For those GenAI can't help anyway.
